archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.5.6a: a) working with organisational functions (such as legal and compliance) to determine legal and regulatory compliance obligations for jurisdictions in which the organisation operates or has a presence
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
